text: Although sensitivity to <extra_id_0> M-CSF <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> can be modulated by regulation of receptor expression and function , <extra_id_0> M-CSF <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> responsiveness is largely determined at a postreceptor level .

We have therefore investigated the changes in protein kinase C ( PKC ) activity upon exposure of monocytes to <extra_id_0> M-CSF <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> .
